name: Log Runner (Beta Test)
description:
This is the beta test for Log Runner, the first game released for Pawsed Development Studios! Tap the screen to jump over any obstacles in your way to get the high score!

You can check the high scores by tapping on the trophy icon, adjust various settings by tapping on the gear icon, and check the changelog by tapping on the page icon, all on the main menu!

Currently, there are three playable levels (The default one, a rainy version of the default level, and an industrial level) and four characters (both a boy and a girl, in two different color schemes). 

Planned additions include a store for various cosmetics, using coins gained in game based off how far you get each time, more characters, and more levels!
